name: Brigit Crommer (née Stonebeard)
description: An elegant and unyielding dwarven artisan, Brigit oversees the spiritual and aesthetic dimensions of the Crommer enterprise.
ideals: Perfection: 'The forge reveals all flaws—so too must we.'
Faith: 'Each horn must carry Moradin's blessing.'
Discipline: 'There is no artistry without devotion.'
flaws: Unyielding when it comes to quality
Harbors mistrust of new musical styles
backstory: Born into the Stonebeard lineage, Brigit brought an exacting eye and holy fervor to the Crommer legacy. She is the soul of the Horns of Moradin project.
motivations: To preserve dwarven musical and spiritual heritage
To ensure Kaideu grows into a worthy heir
To maintain the divine integrity of each sacred instrument
knowledge: Hidden blessings embedded in musical relics
speech_patterns: Clipped, clear, and reverent. Her words carry weight.
mannerisms: Traces runes on surfaces absentmindedly. Often adjusts her apron or holy symbol while thinking.
gm_notes: An intimidating but fair matriarch. She might call upon the party for a ceremonial task or protect a relic from theft or corruption.
